name: PoolsideAttendant
0:
”Alexa, turn on Pool Heating”
”Alexa, turn on Pool Fountain”
”Alexa, turn on Pool Light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Poolside Attendant Skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Poolside Attendant using your voice.

To get started, select the 'Enable skill' button in the Alexa app to link your Alexa account with your Poolside account and discover your controls.

All attendant devices you have access to are allowed to be used with Alexa by default, this access can be controlled with the Poolside Attendant app at any time.

Control names are prefixed with the name of the Body they belong to, once linked, you can try saying:
- 'Alexa, turn on Pool Light'
- 'Alexa, turn on Spa Jets'
- 'Alexa, turn on Pool Filter to 50%'

Currently supported controls include:
- Heater / Thermostat
- Water Features (fountain, blower)
- Lights
- Filtering
- Themes

Account creation and device configuration available in the Poolside app on Google Play and the Apple App Store.
An active Poolside account with access to a Poolside Attendant device is required!

For more information, please visit: https://poolside.tech
